minesweeper.gui

Class GameGui

  • java.lang.Object
    • minesweeper.gui.GameGui
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class GameGui
extends Object
implements Runnable
    The main frame of the game. JRames content pane contains every part of the game graphics
    Author:
    juri

      • createComponents

        public void createComponents(Container contentPane)
        Creates the components used in the gameplay GUI. Creates the main JPabel that will contains the minefield JPanel and other information.
        Parameters:

      • createNewGame

        public void createNewGame(int height,
                 int width,
                 int mines)
        Creates a new instance of the gameLogic class with the set parameters and updates the GUI to show the result. Previous components are removed.
        Parameters:
        height - of the new game
        width - of the new game
        mines - in the new game
